text: I didn't see you in time.
I think so. Uh, just shocked.
Do you want me to call someone?
Do you want to sit down?
Uh, I was riding slow, but there were many people.
Yes, this street is very busy.
It's better to go slow here.
Can I do anything for you?
Have a nice day. Be careful.
Fine, thanks. I am just a little lost.
I think it's on Main Street.
Oh, yes, I know. It  is it far from here?
But we need to cross this street.
Now it's green. We can go.
Yes, I walk a little slow.
Go straight two blocks  and then  turn right.
Is the pharmacy on the corner?
No, my daughter waits for me there.
No need. It was a pleasure.
A car is blocking the way.
Excuse me. Is that red car yours?
I have to go to work.
I just wanted to grab some bread.
Can you move forward a little?
That way I can get out.
Don't leave your car like that again.
Asking the time on the street.
Do you have the time, please?
Which bus goes to Central Park?
At the end of the street.
Yes, but my mom is waiting.
Is there a sign at the stop?
Is this your first time here?
Yes. I don't know this area.
You did the right thing asking.
Yes. I don't want to get lost.
And if I miss the bus,  another one comes after.
You too. Have a nice day.
I'm sorry. He didn't mean to.
No, he walks off leash here.
Did he do anything to you?
No, he just jumped near me.
I see. He's full of energy.
But there are a lot of people here.
Can you put a leash on him?
Can I say hi to him?
Thanks for putting the leash on.
Asking for a photo. Excuse me. Can you help me?
Can you take a picture of me, please?
Where do you want the picture?
No, a little more to the left.
Yes, please. Andy,  look. Here they are.
Have you seen a lot of places yet?
Not yet. I got here yesterday.
I suggest visiting the old town.
Yes. The central market is fun and the food is good.
And if you like art, there's a museum nearby.
Thanks again and for the photos, too.
No problem. Have a great day.
You too. See you  helping with heavy bags.
Do you want some help with your bags?
Are you waiting for the bus?
Okay. Do you have food in your bags?
Yes, I went to the grocery store.
You're welcome. Do you come here often?
When it comes, I'll carry your bags.
No worries. I like to help.
Let's go. I'll take the bags.
You parked in the wrong place.
This is a no parking zone.
No, not from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m.
I was only here for 5 minutes.
Are you going to give me a ticket?
Yes, just on the next street.
Do I have to pay there?
I won't make the same mistake again.
I got dirty with the ice cream.
I got ice cream on me.
Yeah, but I got ice cream on my shirt.
I have some napkins. Do you want one?
Thanks. The stain is still there.
No, it's okay. It's just a little ice cream.
Don't worry. It happens to everyone.
Has it happened to you, too?
Yes. Once at the beach  with ice cream?
Do you want another ice cream?
I don't know. I'm still scared.
I'll get you another in a cup this time.
Shall we go get ice cream?
Yes, I can't see my mom.
Thank you. I'm a little scared.
Where did you last see your mom? by the fruit stand.
Does your mom have long hair?
Are you going to look for her?
You're welcome. Have a good day.
That's all for today. If you enjoyed this video, subscribe and let me know in the comments what situation you'd like to hear next.
